Posts.Content: tjpalma wrote: well wife and i went to mammogram referral and it turned out to be nothing,just some normal tissue that had clumped together and that is what they saw,  talked to radiologist and he said that when they applied pressure to the breast the mass disicpated.  also found out that in the area that we live in they send of mammogram films to a radiologist 300 miles away and he does not even read them a computer reads them and if the computer finds something then it spits out and error, i was so mad caused me alot of grief for nothing and now i am sick with the flu aaack.  but just wanted to say thank you to all of you and God bless you all you all are simply amazing Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: thank you tjpalma lvtwoqlt
